1.Title: Bird Hunter
1.Description: When Nekomata hits an enemy from behind, she ignores 16% of her target's <color=#F0D12B>Physical RES</color>. If the enemy is Stunned, all Nekomata's attacks against them are considered back attacks.
1.Lore: While Nekomata lacks strength due to her small size, she has the perceptiveness and agility required to locate her enemies' weaknesses and strike right where it hurts most.

2.Title: Cat & Mouse
2.Description: When there's only one enemy on the field and Nekomata is in combat, her Energy Generation Rate is increased by 25%.
2.Lore:
Cats always prefer to toy with their prey.
If there's only one mouse left in combat — that's Nekomata's play time.

3.Title: Curious Left Tail
3.Lore:
According to the legends of the old civilization, each tail represents one of a cat's many lives, with years of wisdom and experience stored within...
Even if that's not true, the experience Nekomata has gained on the streets certainly is.

4.Title: Sharpen Claws
4.Description: When Nekomata uses her <color=#FFFFFF>EX Special Attack</color>, her CRIT Rate increases by 7% for 15s, stacking up to 2 times, with each stack's duration being calculated separately.
4.Lore:
"Gimme more, gimme MORE! I can eat 'em all~"
Her eyes sparkle as she licks the back of her paws.

5.Title: Lucky Right Tail
5.Lore: According to the legends of the old civilization, each tail represents one of a cat's many lives, with years of wisdom and experience stored within... Sometimes Nekomata wonders to herself: If she is lucky enough to keep surviving, will she eventually grow another tail?

6.Title: Predator Lineage
6.Description: When Nekomata launches a <color=#FFFFFF>Chain Attack</color> or uses her <color=#FFFFFF>Ultimate</color>, her CRIT DMG increases by 18%, stacking up to 3 times. The effect expires when she's no longer in-combat. This effect gains maximum stacks immediately on defeating an enemy.
6.Lore:
"When a feline Thiren gets positive reinforcement from aggressive behavior,
their latent animalistic tendencies emerge.
Fortunately, these tendencies aren't permanent..."
—Excerpt from the Handbook of Incomplete Research on Feline Thirens

DescriptionByLevel.1: When Nekomata's <color=#FFFFFF>Dodge Counter</color> or <color=#FFFFFF>Quick Assist</color> hits an enemy, her DMG increases by <color=#2BAD00>30%</color> for 6s.
DescriptionByLevel.2: When Nekomata's <color=#FFFFFF>Dodge Counter</color> or <color=#FFFFFF>Quick Assist</color> hits an enemy, her DMG increases by <color=#2BAD00>35%</color> for 6s.
DescriptionByLevel.3: When Nekomata's <color=#FFFFFF>Dodge Counter</color> or <color=#FFFFFF>Quick Assist</color> hits an enemy, her DMG increases by <color=#2BAD00>40%</color> for 6s.
DescriptionByLevel.4: When Nekomata's <color=#FFFFFF>Dodge Counter</color> or <color=#FFFFFF>Quick Assist</color> hits an enemy, her DMG increases by <color=#2BAD00>45%</color> for 6s.
DescriptionByLevel.5: When Nekomata's <color=#FFFFFF>Dodge Counter</color> or <color=#FFFFFF>Quick Assist</color> hits an enemy, her DMG increases by <color=#2BAD00>50%</color> for 6s.
DescriptionByLevel.6: When Nekomata's <color=#FFFFFF>Dodge Counter</color> or <color=#FFFFFF>Quick Assist</color> hits an enemy, her DMG increases by <color=#2BAD00>55%</color> for 6s.
DescriptionByLevel.7: When Nekomata's <color=#FFFFFF>Dodge Counter</color> or <color=#FFFFFF>Quick Assist</color> hits an enemy, her DMG increases by <color=#2BAD00>60%</color> for 6s.

MathSkill.Title: Additional Ability: Catwalk
MathSkill.Description:
When another character in your squad shares the same Attribute or Faction:
After any character inflicts <color=#F0D12B>Assault</color>, increases the DMG of Nekomata's next <color=#FFFFFF>EX Special Attack</color> by 35%, stacking up to 2 times.

102100001.Title: Basic Attack: Kitty Slash
102100001.Description:
Press <IconMap:Icon_Normal> to activate:
Unleashes up to 5 slashes, dealing <color=#F0D12B>Physical DMG</color>.
On the last hit, there is a 33.33% chance to repeat this hit 3 times.

102100002.Title: Basic Attack: Crimson Blade
102100002.Description:
Hold <IconMap:Icon_Normal> during the first 3 hits of Nekomata's <color=#FFFFFF>Basic Attack</color> to activate:
Slashes enemies in front and passes through them, dealing <color=#F0D12B>Physical DMG</color>.
Upon activation, there is a 33.33% chance to repeat this attack 3 times.

102100003.Title: Special Attack: Surprise Attack
102100003.Description:
Press <IconMap:Icon_Special> to activate:
Unleashes a downward strike, dealing <color=#F0D12B>Physical DMG</color>.
Anti-Interrupt level is increased while using this skill.

102100004.Title: EX Special Attack: Super Surprise Attack!
102100004.Description:
With enough Energy, press <IconMap:Icon_SpecialReady> to activate:
Unleashes a powerful falling slash that deals massive <color=#F0D12B>Physical DMG</color>.
Character is invulnerable while using this skill.

102110018.Title: EX Special Attack: Super Surprise Attack!

102100005.Title: Dodge: Can't Touch Me-ow~
102100005.Description:
Press <IconMap:Icon_Evade> to activate:
A quick dash dodge.
Character is invulnerable while using this skill.

102100006.Title: Dash Attack: Over Here!
102100006.Description:
Press <IconMap:Icon_Normal> during a dodge to activate:
Slashes enemies in front, dealing <color=#F0D12B>Physical DMG</color>.

102100007.Title: Dodge Counter: Phantom Claws
102100007.Description:
Press <IconMap:Icon_Normal> during a <color=#FFFFFF>Perfect Dodge</color> to activate:
Slashes enemies in front, dealing <color=#F0D12B>Physical DMG</color>.
Character is invulnerable while using this skill.

102100008.Title: Chain Attack: Claw Swipe
102100008.Description:
When a <color=#FFFFFF>Chain Attack</color> is triggered, select the character to activate:
Unleashes a powerful slash at enemies ahead in a large area, dealing massive <color=#F0D12B>Physical DMG</color>.
Character is invulnerable while using this skill.

102100009.Title: Ultimate: Claw Smash
102100009.Description:
When Decibel Rating is at <color=#FFFFFF>Maximum</color>, press <IconMap:Icon_UltimateReady> to activate:
Unleashes powerful slashes at enemies ahead in a large area, dealing massive <color=#F0D12B>Physical DMG</color>.
Character is invulnerable while using this skill.

102100011.Title: Quick Assist: Cat's Paw
102100011.Description:
When the active character is launched, press <IconMap:Icon_Switch> to activate:
Slashes enemies in front, dealing <color=#F0D12B>Physical DMG</color>.
Character is invulnerable while using this skill.

102100012.Title: Defensive Assist: Desperate Defense
102100012.Description:
When the character on field is about to be attacked, press <IconMap:Icon_Switch> to activate:
Parries the enemy's attack, dealing massive Daze.
Character is invulnerable while using this skill.

102100013.Title: Assist Follow-Up: Shadow Strike
102100013.Description:
Press <IconMap:Icon_Normal> after a <color=#FFFFFF>Defensive Assist</color> to activate:
Charge and slash enemies in front, dealing <color=#F0D12B>Physical DMG</color>.
Character is invulnerable while using this skill.
